text: Jjukira ekiseera Katonda bweyagamba nti; Owange ggwe Isa nze ngenda kukutuukiririza ekyo kyenakuwandiikako, era ngenda kusitula nkuleete gyendi era nkutukuze kwabo abaakaafuwala, abo abakugoberera ngenda kubassa waggulu waabo abakafuwala okutuusa ku lunaku lwâ€™enkomerero oluvanyuma gyendi mwenna gyemugenda okudda, olwo ndyoke mbalamule mwebyo byemwayawukanangamu
